EmailTemplate.name: 202003_Americas_BK_BGA_AEA_Event.AeroCruze 100&230 Confirmation Email AEA
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering for the AeroCruz 100 & 230 autopilot session
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Partner}},
Thank you for registering for the BendixKing Product Training Session on: AeroCruze 100 & 230 Autopilot
Date: Wednesday, March 25 8:30 AM – 9:30 AM Room Location: Cheekwood B What We’ll Cover: In this one-hour session, we will provide a detailed walk-through on AeroCruze 100 & 230 autopilots. We'll also review insights, installation, ordering and tips and tricks for the AeroCruze 100 and AeroCruze 230 autopilots.
We are excited to see you there!
Sincerely, Honeywell Aerospace {{my.AeroCruze:default=Add to Calendar}}
